Referral.title: إحالة الآخرين
Referral.description: إحالة Sempo إلى شخص ما في مجتمعك المحتاج. إذا كانوا مستلمًا مناسبًا ، فسوف تتم دعوتهم للانضمام إلى البرنامج.
Referral.error_message: واحد أو أكثر من الحقول المفقودة

VersionModal.now_message: يرجى تحديث التطبيق الخاص بك. لم يعد هذا الإصدار مدعومًا.
VersionModal.soon_message: يرجى تحديث التطبيق الخاص بك. لن يكون هذا الإصدار متاحًا قريبًا.

OnboardingScreens.DigitalWalletDesc: إنها أموالك نحن نساعدك على إدارة رفاهيتك المالية في محفظتك الرقمية الشخصية.
OnboardingScreens.PaymentsDesc: أرسل الأموال على الفور إلى أي رقم هاتف. ادفع بسهولة في المتجر. مضمون من قبل تقنية Blockchain.
OnboardingScreens.VerificationDesc: الحصول على التحقق من زيادة حدود الإنفاق. تشهد ببساطة وثائق الهوية ووسائل الإعلام الاجتماعية.
OnboardingScreens.ReferralDesc: إحالة مجتمعك إلى Sempo ومشاركة الفوائد. كن سفيرا للمجتمع.

SendPayment.Prompt: Sempo ID، رقم الهاتف ، عنوان Blockchain ، إلخ

VerifyAccountWrapper.VerifyDesc: Securely provide information to verify your identity in just a few taps!
VerifyAccountWrapper.VerifyDescIncomplete: We need more information from you to verify your identity
VerifyAccountWrapper.PayDesc: Choose between bank transfer and PayPal to withdraw your funds!

VerifyFailureOptions.id_non_valid: ID document is not valid or expired
VerifyFailureOptions.id_partial: ID document is partial. Important information is covered.
VerifyFailureOptions.id_damaged: ID document is damaged. ID is unreadable due to physical damage.
VerifyFailureOptions.id_non_english: ID document is not in English.
VerifyFailureOptions.id_blurry: ID document or selfie is too blurry
VerifyFailureOptions.selfie_no_match: ID photo does not match selfie
VerifyFailureOptions.selfie_id_non_present: ID document is not present in selfie image
VerifyFailureOptions.selfie_covered: Part of the face in the selfie image is covered by a hand, ID, anything else

VerifyLaunchScreen.LegalTerms: By continuing, you agree to our
VerifyLaunchScreen.PromptBanner: We take your privacy and security seriously. Learn more about why we do 'Know Your Customer' checks

VerifyLaunchScreen.Title: Verify Your Identity
VerifyLaunchScreen.Subtitle: It will take less than 2 minutes
VerifyLaunchScreen.HowHeading: What you will need to do
VerifyLaunchScreen.StepOne: Take a photo of an identity document
VerifyLaunchScreen.BusinessQuestion: Are you registering as a business?

CountrySelectionScreen.Title: Select issuing country
CountrySelectionScreen.Subtitle: Choose the country your document is from

DocumentTypeScreen.Title: Select a document
DocumentTypeScreen.Subtitle: You will take a photo of it in the next step

DocumentCameraScreen.Title: Scan {{type}} {{side}}
DocumentCameraScreen.Prompt: Fit the {{side}} of your {{type}} in the frame

SelfieCameraScreen.Title: Take a selfie
SelfieCameraScreen.Prompt: Make sure your face and document are both visible
SelfieCameraScreen.Clear: MY SELFIE AND DOCUMENT IS CLEAR

OutcomeScreen.Title: Account Verification {{outcome}}
OutcomeScreen.Subtitle: This can take as little as 10 minutes, but up to 48 hours in some cases. You will be notified further via SMS and in app.
OutcomeScreen.Business: For business accounts, we require extra information, please download and complete the following form.
